answers.q: what is calcium salt of triglycerides acids e470a in baking
answers.a: In baking, E470a (calcium salts of fatty acids, often calcium stearate) is an emulsifier/stabiliser used to help fats and water blend, condition dough, and keep powdered mixes freeâ€‘flowing. It also acts as a release agent to reduce sticking and can improve crumb softness and shelf life.
